state_description: This screen indicates that the maintenance tasks have been completed successfully. It provides an option to share the results and suggests an additional action to remove duplicate files.

enables.name: Share Results
enables.description: Allows the user to share the results of the completed maintenance tasks.

enables.name: View Log
enables.description: Opens the log to view details of the maintenance tasks performed.

enables.name: Try Now - Get Rid of Duplicate Files
enables.description: Initiates the process to delete duplicate files using Gemini to free up space.
